page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW -WALES AREA.
page.content: This area contains three small villages,Beighton,Wales,and Killamarsh with farmland and industrial estates lying between them.Wales and Beighton are in South Yorkshire.Killamarsh is in Derbyshire.We are situated about 8 miles from the city of Sheffield. Rotherham and Worksop are handy places for shopping too.In recent years people have been moving out of the cities and coming to live in places like Wales.There are many new families who live here and work in the cities but there are still old families here too.This village was once a large mining community, but the recent pit closures and the coming of new families has changed this.Rother Valley park is at the edge of this village.It is a new park with lots of activities.
